channel.title: CMS on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in CMS on NS News and Views

item.title: Technically challenge your web designer!
item.description: I must confess to have slightly struggled with the title of this blog post, as I didn’t wish to be responsible for encouraging unnecessary complaints and animosity between clients and web designers!

item.title: To CMS or not to CMS?
item.description: OK, the time has come for a website refresh – it’s something that I like to try and do annually (well, I say annually, what I really mean is that I did it last year).
